ack.title: Acknowledgement
ack.p: The topic of this manuscript was debated during a Meeting on "Environment and Allergy" held in Curitiba (Paranà, Brazil) on 9–10 April 2016 and promoted by Prof Nelson Rosario, University of Curitiba, and by World Allergy Organization with two lectures of Prof Gennaro D’Amato.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: There are no sources of funding to declare.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: In this manuscript there are not data to share.

sec.title: Authors’ contributions
sec.p: All authors helped to draft the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors’ declare that they have no competing interests.

sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
